entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
